title: Independent Legis Power in China and Iran

content.question: Which of the following institutions most limit the exercise of independent legislative power?

choices.label: Mexico’s National Electoral Institute (INE) and Nigeria’s Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC)
China’s Standing Committee of the Politburo and Iran’s Guardian Council
United Kingdom’s House of Lords and Nigeria’s president
Iran’s Supreme Leader and the United Kingdom’s monarchy

content.answer: China’s Standing Committee of the Politburo and Iran’s Guardian Council

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
